name: xactions
description: Complete X/Twitter automation toolkit — 68 MCP tools for scraping, posting, engagement, analytics, and more. No API fees. Uses Puppeteer browser automation.
author: nichxbt

setup.instructions: After installing, set XACTIONS_SESSION_COOKIE to your X/Twitter auth_token cookie (DevTools → Application → Cookies → auth_token on x.com).

agents.name: growth
agents.description: Automate X/Twitter growth — follow targets, engage with content, analyze performance

agents.name: cleanup
agents.description: Clean up your X/Twitter account — unfollow non-followers, unlike old posts, clear bookmarks

agents.name: scrape
agents.description: Scrape X/Twitter data — profiles, followers, tweets, trends. Export to JSON/CSV

unfollow-nonfollowers.description: Unfollow accounts that don't follow you back

grow.description: Run automated growth engagement on target topics or accounts

analytics.description: Get engagement analytics for your X/Twitter account
